name: The Dragon Prince Season 4
summary: 第三季结束的两年后，卡勒姆依然因为瑞拉的离开而无法释怀。与此同时，克劳迪娅复活了父亲威伦，神秘的摘星精灵阿拉沃斯又有何种计划？

eps.name: Rebirthday
eps.desc: Claudia tells her father that in the two years since the Battle of the Storm Spire, she worked with Aaravos to revive Viren, during which she began dating an Earthblood Elf named Terry. However, she reveals that the spell will only last thirty days and that Aaravos would be needed in-person to make it permanent, requiring that they break the Startouch Elf out of his prison. In Katolis, Ezran makes plans for Zubeia and Zym's visit. Callum, now the High Mage, celebrates his 17th birthday, though it's marred by his memories of Rayla leaving him on that very day two years ago. At a refugee camp for the Elves of Lux Aurea, Janai proposes to Amaya.

eps.name: Fallen Stars
eps.desc: To free Aaravos, Viren, Claudia and Terry must retrieve Viren's staff from the tip of the Storm Spire, but due to his death trauma, Viren is struck with severe acrophobia. Karim is worried about the impact Janai and Amaya's upcoming marriage might have on the Sunfire Empire's cultural pride. Callum finishes translating the runes on Viren's mirror when Rayla unexpectedly returns.

eps.name: Breathtaking
eps.desc: Callum and Rayla's reunion is awkward because of Callum's resentment for her vanishing on him without explanation. Zubeia and Zym arrive in Katolis, but their welcome is darkened by lingering resentments from the humans, whereupon Ezran delivers an empathic speech against the vicious circle of hatred. Claudia finds the Storm Spire's secret treasure vault and the staff, but is challenged by Ibis. Terry fatally stabs Ibis from behind, allowing Claudia to claim the staff. With his last strength, Ibis sends a warning to Zubeia that "the Fallen Star" has returned.

eps.name: Through the Looking Glass
eps.desc: In the face of this new crisis, Zubeia returns with Zym to the Storm Spire, with Ezran, Callum, Rayla, and Soren joining her along with the mirror Viren stole from Avizandum. Zubeia reveals that for centuries, Aaravos has been secretly pulling the strings behind every major conflict in Xadia by seducing people who are fascinated with magic, until a human girl, the archdragons and Elven archmages worked together to intern him in a magical prison with six component keys, to keep him trapped for eternity. As they observe Aaravos through the mirror, Aaravos takes control of Callum, using him to taunt the others before he shatters the pane. Simultaneously, Claudia uses her magic to break open the cocoon, freeing an Elf homunculus. In the Lux Aurea refugee camp, a Katolian architect named Lucia is badly injured by a Sunfire Elf after she callously extinguishes a fire he lit for a religious ritual.

eps.name: The Great Gates
eps.desc: After discovering what Claudia did, Ezran's party (sans Zym) and Zubeia depart for Umber Tor, the residence of archdragon Rex Igneous, to collect the first key to Aaravos' prison before Claudia. Upon arriving at Umber Tor, they find the gate blocked by rubble, but the door guards direct them to a secret entrance within the Drakewood, deep within the Uncharted Forest. Rayla and Soren separate from the others to look for the entrance, but when they come upon an Earthblood Elf bullying a drake, Soren impulsively intervenes on the beast's behalf, only to be captured and thrown into a hole called the Pit of Despair alongside the drake. Aaravos' homunculus guides Viren, Claudia and Terry to Umber Tor.

eps.name: The Drakewood
eps.desc: Just as Ezran, Callum and Rayla realize Soren is missing, they are joined by Zym, who has run away. While trying to help them find Soren, Zym is brought down by the Elven Riders of Drakewood; while the others save him, they befriend a young Earthblood Elf named N'than. He leads them to the Pit of Despair, which is also the secret entrance to Rex Igneous' lair. Janai is forced to bring the incident with Lucia before a tribunal. Lucia is found guilty, but instead of executing her, Janai decrees that she must erect a shrine to ensure fire safety for the camp. Believing that she is losing her racial identity, Karim decides to turn against his sister. Soren turns out to be alive and having befriended the drake, but as he tries to rejoin his friends, he encounters Claudia.

eps.name: Beneath the Surface
eps.desc: N'than guides his new friends through the hazards of the underground passages. During a rest, Callum and Rayla use the chance for a talk, and fearful of hurting his loved ones, Callum asks Rayla to kill him if Aaravos takes control of him again. Soren captures Claudia and tries to reason with her, but is instead captured by Viren and Terry.

eps.name: Rex Igneous
eps.desc: Ezran, Callum, Rayla, Zym and N'than enter Rex Igneous' lair. They meet the Archdragon of Earth, but even after learning of Avizandum's death and the true circumstances of their coming, he cannot help them, as none of the archdragons truly know where Aaravos' prison is. Just then, Claudia appears and puts them all - except Zym - to sleep with dark magic. Janai has a private discussion with Amaya about what she wants to do with her life, which renews her resolve to become a queen worthy of her people. However, Karim decides to accelerate his plans by challenging Janai to a blood duel for the rulership over Lux Aurea.

eps.name: Escape from Umber Tor
eps.desc: Janai reluctantly accepts Karim's challenge and beats him, and Karim is arrested when he refuses to accept his defeat. Claudia, Viren and Terry find a map leading to Aaravos' prison engraved on Rex Igneous' fang. As they recover it, Soren and Zym wake Rayla, who succeeds in rousing Rex Igneous by stabbing his foot. Enraged, the archdragon attacks them all, forcing them to flee. When Rayla takes Terry hostage, Claudia reveals that Runaan and her parents were trapped in cursed coins by her father, and surrenders them to Rayla. The companions just barely escape Igneous' wrath with Zubeia's help and are happily reunited, but Viren once again falls under the sway of dark magic.
